item.title: Sweep Control v1.0.1.8
item.description:
Product: Sweep Control v1.0.1.8
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 03 Jun 2024 09:14:35 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: [SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: SweepControl.lvclass
- Issue #82: Sweep Control now supports linear, power, and triangle sweep types
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.7.1.7
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.7.1.7
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 31 May 2024 22:04:21 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.7.1]
- Issue #81: update state sequence in Lockin_Sweep to update IV graph at the correct moment
- Issue #84: Lockin_time Macro: exit state ws not being queued properly after receiving T notifier.
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.0.2.7
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.0.2.7
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 31 May 2024 14:37:37 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.0.2]
- Issue #79: fix default gate resistor
- When changing a channel to "gate" configuration the shunt reistor value will be set to the Default Shunt Resistor value.
- After that the user can change to whichever resistor value they want and the program will not take over
- Issue #80: Update populate VI ring
- SweepControl --> Sweep Control subfolder)
- add path validation and disable values inside ring if they are not found
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: JSON-RPC v1.2.1.6
item.description:
Product: JSON-RPC v1.2.1.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 30 May 2024 16:31:38 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Library for encoding and decoding JSON-RPC 2.0 request and response objects

https://www.jsonrpc.org/specification

Release Notes: [1.2.1]
- Issue #108: change creation of result behavior to keep input structure (previously was converting to an array as required of the params object)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
